additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Sugar, Glucose Syrup Solids, Milk Solids, Vegetable Fat, Cocoa Powder (10%), Salt, Flavours (Contain Milk), Emulsifiers (471, 481, Soy Lecithin), Stabilisers (340, 452, 451), Anticaking Agent (551).

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Contains allergens. See allergen list for details.

additionalProperty.name: Country Of Origin
additionalProperty.value: Packed in Australia from multiple origins

description: Empty the contents of the sachet (25G) in a mug. Add 200ml of hot water, stir well.  Also delicious with PASCALL marshmallows or CADBURY FLAKE crumbled on top.
name: Instant Hot Chocolate Blend 6x25g
